entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
